identificationModule.briefTitle: NW-301 TCR-T in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumor
identificationModule.officialTitle: Open-label, Single-arm, Phase 1 Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Autologous TCR-T Cell Therapy in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors

descriptionModule.briefSummary: An open label, two cohorts, multiple dose exploratory clinical study to independently evaluate the safety, efficacy, and pharmacokinetics of autologous anti-KRAS G12V/G12D mutation T-cell Receptor T cell in advanced solid tumor.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: This study is an open, two cohorts single infusion, dose escalation/dose regimen finding study to independently assess the safety and pharmacokinetics of KRAS G12V/G12D mutation TCR-T cell therapies, and to obtain the preliminary efficacy results in subjects who have been diagnosed with advanced solid tumor with KRAS G12V/G12D mutation and failed to standard systemic treatment.

armGroups.label: NW-301V monotherapy in patients with Solid Tumors with KRAS G12V mutation
